ygData.subject: Re: Are you all at work?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a way, this is my work.    Life is good. John Hoskin C.E.O.   GameStats News Network http://www.gamestats.com
ygData.messageBody:
In a way, this is my work. Life is good.

John Hoskin
C.E.O. GameStats News Network
http://www.gamestats.com

At 02:43 PM 8/25/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>
>Just wondering...
>
>...if I'm the only one who sits at work all day, reading these messages as
>they come in. Its bad enough I play all night. Now, between surfing for EQ
>info, reading the newsgroup, and reading this list, its a wonder I get
>anything done at all!
>
>
